description:
Legendary costumes for original WARRIORS OROCHI officers will be added.
Enjoy the new battle experience!

■Content
Legendary Costumes for:
Gaia, Hades, Yang Jian, Ryu Hayabusa, Joan of Arc, Achilles, and Perseus

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".

*This content is only applicable to the WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate, it cannot be used in WARRIORS OROCHI 4 base game.
name: Legendary Costumes OROCHI Pack 4
